roleset.name: cause to come apart
roleset.note: DISSOLVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dissolve' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4, other framed members include alter, decrease, halt, narrow, shut, slow, sweeten, weaken and worsen. No comparison. (from dissolve.01-v predicate notes)
DISSOLUTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to 'dissolve.01' Vn classes other_cos-45.4 and break-45.1. Fn class dispersal.Framed by Katie. (from dissolution.01-n)

example.name: from the corpus
example.text: He-1 joins Nov. 13, *trace*-1 dissolving his consulting firm, Canter, Achenbaum Associates.
example.arg: his consulting firm, Canter, Achenbaum Associates

example.name: with medium
example.text: John dissolved the poison in Mary's wine.

example.name: medium as subject
example.text: The strong acid dissolved the grease stains on John's bathtub. Unfortunately it also dissolved the bathtub.
example.arg: the grease stains on John's bathtub

example.name: with components
example.text: John dissolved his corporation into three spinoff companies.

example.name: Arg 1 (most common)
example.text: the eventual dissolution of the EC

example.name: With temporal after arg 1
example.text: dissolution of Hungary 's Communist Party this month

example.name: One more with arg 1 only
example.text: The dissolution of the Warsaw Pact
